LanguageData.BuzzerFactionGreetingHostile: You hear {0} audibly clamp on the microphone with {0_possessive} mandibles before ripping it and disconnecting.
LanguageData.BuzzerFactionGreetingHostileAppreciative: Hissing and clicking {0_possessive} mandibles, {0} demands that you make a gesture of unity, like bringing gifts to one of {0_possessive} colonies or releasing {0_possessive} swarm's prisoners unharmed. Until then, {0_pronoun} is unwilling to discuss anything.\n\nGrowling into the microphone, {0_pronoun} disconnects.
LanguageData.BuzzerFactionGreetingWary: {0} happily chitters and asks what help you need.
LanguageData.BuzzerFactionGreetingWarm: Chittering and hissing with joy, {0} greets {NEGOTIATOR_labelShort}, while audibly munching on some food, and asks what service {LEADER_pronoun} can provide.
LanguageData.BuzzerMilitaryAidSent: {0} clacks {0_possessive} mandibles before agreeing to send a group to help.
